official_title: To prohibit the transfer of personal information to any person or business outside the United States, without notice.
short_title: Notify Americans Before Outsourcing Personal Information Act
subjects: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

summary.text: Notify Americans Before Outsourcing Personal Information Act - Prohibits a business from transferring personally identifiable information of a U.S. citizen to any foreign affiliate or subcontractor in another country without providing notice to such citizen that the information may be transferred to such affiliate or subcontractor. Authorizes a private cause of action in a state court to enforce compliance with this Act.
